Projects

Restaurant Management System

The system is designed to improve the manner in which restaurants carry out their services. They range from online ordering of food by customers. In this system a manager can be able to manage the chain of restaurants that he has under him/her. They can also add or delete a food item from the system.

QR code integration

This is a project that helps integrate QR code to medicine packaging. Helping with logistics and ensuring no theft in the medicine delivery and health industry.
